https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AgzxTa433VAz0RAtFwyi5OTpsqc.jpg Charlie Chaplin is a 2002 Tamil film directed by Sakthi Chidambaram. The film stars Prabhu Ganesan, Prabhu Deva, Abhirami and Gayathri Raghuraman in lead roles. Charlie Chaplin
